title: Historical Analysis Limitations
text: While understanding past trends is valuable, what does this approach lack in terms of future planning? Consider how having insights into future events could enhance decision-making.

title: The Power of Prediction
text: Think about the advantage businesses have when they can anticipate future trends or events. How can this foresight create more value than just reacting to past data?

title: Prescriptive Recommendations
text: Consider how making informed recommendations based on predictions can impact strategic planning. How does suggesting improvements provide additional value?

hintAnswer: You bring more value when you don't simply understand what's happened, but you understand what will happen and can recommend conditions to improve on that.
title: Connecting Past, Present, and Future
text: Link your understanding of past events to probable future outcomes and make recommendations. How does this create a comprehensive approach to problem-solving?
choices: Predicting the future is exciting and interesting to people.
You bring more value when you don't simply understand what's happened, but you understand what will happen and can recommend conditions to improve on that.
Understanding what has happened in the past is all you need to do.
The more work you do, the happier your boss will be.
